009package com.weather.sdk;
010
011import java.time.Instant;
012import java.util.Objects;
013
014/**
015 * Immutable snapshot of SDK performance metrics and statistics.
016 *
017 * <p>This class provides operational metrics including:
018 *
019 * <ul>
020 *   <li>Total API requests made
021 *   <li>Cache hit/miss statistics
022 *   <li>API success/failure rates
023 *   <li>Average response times
024 *   <li>Last API call timestamp
025 * </ul>
026 *
027 * <p><strong>Thread Safety:</strong> This class is immutable and thread-safe. Instances represent a
028 * point-in-time snapshot and will not be updated.
029 *
030 * @since 1.0.0
031 */
032public final class SDKMetrics {
033
034  /** Total number of API requests made. */
035  private final long totalRequests;
036
037  /** Number of successful API requests. */
038  private final long successCount;
039
040  /** Number of failed API requests. */
041  private final long failedRequests;
042
043  /** Number of cache hits. */
044  private final long cacheHits;
045
046  /** Number of cache misses. */
047  private final long cacheMisses;
048
049  /** Average response time in milliseconds. */
050  private final double avgResponseMs;
051
052  /** Timestamp of the last API call, or null if no calls made. */
053  private final Instant lastApiCallTime;
054
055  /**
056   * Creates a new SDKMetrics instance with the specified values.
057   *
058   * @param totalRequests total number of API requests made
059   * @param successCount number of successful API requests
060   * @param failedRequests number of failed API requests
061   * @param cacheHits number of cache hits
062   * @param cacheMisses number of cache misses
063   * @param avgResponseMs average response time in milliseconds
064   * @param lastApiCallTime timestamp of the last API call, may be null
065   */
066  public SDKMetrics(
067      final long totalRequests,
068      final long successCount,
069      final long failedRequests,
070      final long cacheHits,
071      final long cacheMisses,
072      final double avgResponseMs,
073      final Instant lastApiCallTime) {
074    this.totalRequests = totalRequests;
075    this.successCount = successCount;
076    this.failedRequests = failedRequests;
077    this.cacheHits = cacheHits;
078    this.cacheMisses = cacheMisses;
079    this.avgResponseMs = avgResponseMs;
080    this.lastApiCallTime = lastApiCallTime;
081  }
082
083  /**
084   * Returns the total number of API requests made.
085   *
086   * @return total request count
087   */
088  public long getTotalRequests() {
089    return totalRequests;
090  }
091
092  /**
093   * Returns the number of successful API requests.
094   *
095   * @return successful request count
096   */
097  public long getSuccessfulRequests() {
098    return successCount;
099  }
100
101  /**
102   * Returns the number of failed API requests.
103   *
104   * @return failed request count
105   */
106  public long getFailedRequests() {
107    return failedRequests;
108  }
109
110  /**
111   * Returns the number of cache hits.
112   *
113   * @return cache hit count
114   */
115  public long getCacheHits() {
116    return cacheHits;
117  }
118
119  /**
120   * Returns the number of cache misses.
121   *
122   * @return cache miss count
123   */
124  public long getCacheMisses() {
125    return cacheMisses;
126  }
127
128  /**
129   * Returns the average response time in milliseconds.
130   *
131   * @return average response time in ms
132   */
133  public double getAverageResponseTimeMs() {
134    return avgResponseMs;
135  }
136
137  /**
138   * Returns the timestamp of the last API call.
139   *
140   * @return last API call timestamp, or null if no calls have been made
141   */
142  public Instant getLastApiCallTime() {
143    return lastApiCallTime;
144  }
145
146  /**
147   * Returns the cache hit rate as a percentage (0.0 to 100.0).
148   *
149   * @return cache hit rate percentage, or 0.0 if no cache operations
150   */
151  public double getCacheHitRate() {
152    final long totalCacheOps = cacheHits + cacheMisses;
153    final double result;
154    if (totalCacheOps == 0) {
155      result = 0.0;
156    } else {
157      result = cacheHits * 100.0 / totalCacheOps;
158    }
159    return result;
160  }
161
162  /**
163   * Returns the API success rate as a percentage (0.0 to 100.0).
164   *
165   * @return success rate percentage, or 0.0 if no requests made
166   */
167  public double getSuccessRate() {
168    final double result;
169    if (totalRequests == 0) {
170      result = 0.0;
171    } else {
172      result = successCount * 100.0 / totalRequests;
173    }
174    return result;
175  }
176
177  @Override
178  public boolean equals(final Object obj) {
179    final boolean result;
180    if (this == obj) {
181      result = true;
182    } else if (obj == null || getClass() != obj.getClass()) {
183      result = false;
184    } else {
185      final SDKMetrics other = (SDKMetrics) obj;
186      result =
187          totalRequests == other.totalRequests
188              && successCount == other.successCount
189              && failedRequests == other.failedRequests
190              && cacheHits == other.cacheHits
191              && cacheMisses == other.cacheMisses
192              && Double.compare(other.avgResponseMs, avgResponseMs) == 0
193              && Objects.equals(lastApiCallTime, other.lastApiCallTime);
194    }
195    return result;
196  }
197
198  @Override
199  public int hashCode() {
200    return Objects.hash(
201        totalRequests,
202        successCount,
203        failedRequests,
204        cacheHits,
205        cacheMisses,
206        avgResponseMs,
207        lastApiCallTime);
208  }
209
210  @Override
211  public String toString() {
212    return String.format(
213        "SDKMetrics{totalRequests=%d, successCount=%d, failedRequests=%d, "
214            + "cacheHits=%d, cacheMisses=%d, avgResponseMs=%.2fms, lastCall=%s}",
215        totalRequests,
216        successCount,
217        failedRequests,
218        cacheHits,
219        cacheMisses,
220        avgResponseMs,
221        lastApiCallTime);
222  }
223}
